name: Quarantine
summary: Find the cure. Save the world. Quarantine is an intense turn-based strategy game about waging war on pandemic disease. Recruit a team of specialized operatives to deploy on worldwide missions. Research the contagion, upgrade your tech, and quarantine the outbreak before it kills us all.
info:
• 中文名: 隔离
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 模拟 / 角色扮演 / 冒险 / 策略
  • 发行日期: 2017-02-09
  • 售价: ¥ 36
